articles.title: Chief: 3 dead in Indiana mall shooting; witness kills gunman
articles.description: GREENWOOD, Ind. (AP) — Three people were fatally shot and two were injured Sunday evening at an Indiana mall after a man with a rifle opened fire in a food court and an armed civilian shot and killed him, police said.
